title: Mr. Nobu’s Otherworld Chronicles - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Harem   Romance
tags: Adventurers   Age Regression   Appearance Changes   Appearance Different from Actual Age   Cooking   Demi-Humans   Demons   Dungeons   Game Elements   Goddesses   Gods   Human-Nonhuman Relationship   Level System   Male Protagonist   Marriage   Monsters   Polygamy   R-15   S*aves   Summoning Magic   Sword And Magic   Transported to Another World   Weak to Strong
author: Kotobuki Wataru   ことぶきわたる
description:
I’m Izumi Nobusada. 35 year old, just a humble clerk of a convenience store.

When I was enjoying my consecutive holidays that I hadn’t had for a long time, it was just my luck that I seemingly got summoned to another world. Furthermore, a former demon lord interfered in this summoning.

The former demon lord told me, 『Please listen to my two requests if you become strong. You can live freely besides that.』 Usually here, I should have been the one who got my wish fulfilled shouldn’t it? Well whatever. The former demon lord made my body younger as a farewell gift. I’m gonna say goodbye to my introvert past self and do my best.

Aim to become! Mofumofu King!?>
